author: thuer
body:
Adding the possibility of additional weights (scale / pdf variation) for Sherpa 2.2. Sherpa stores the weighst in form of named weights which we do not do in CMSSW, so the relevant names are stored in GenRunInfoProduct
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_0_X #13230 (original by @thuer).
title: Adding the possibility of additional weights (scale / pdf variation) for Sherpa 2.2, storing the relevant information in GenRunInfoProduct
